title: saami ninnEkOri (varaNam)
sahitya:
sAmi ninnE kOri vacciyunnAnurA sArasAkSa sakala lOka nAyaka

anupallavi

 bhUmilO nIku sari evarunnArurA yuvanamandu velasina shrinivAsa karivarada

caraNam

 tAmasamu saluyuTa meragAdurA

alternate caraNa

sarasakidi manci samayamu sarasija nEtrA
